page.title: 20DOMESDAY AUTHORS
page.content: { We are members of a 3rd year {Environmental Studies}group in Buxton Girls' School. We started work in May and had 70 minutes a week. We went on a{field trip}to survey the area and some of us went to the area to interview people and to do the traffic survey. We worked in groups to write the text pages.{Tracey, Vickie, Julie {& Jenny}went to the college.{Claire, {Sian & Sarah}found out about the farms and the school.{Nicola, Jane, Tania & {Sharon}wrote about the churches & the industries.{Karen & Lyn}found out about the reservoir & public transport.{Claire & Kathryn}found out about the limestone & quarries. {Tracey, Tracy, Jane & Nicola}did the traffic survey.{Jane & Kris}researched Solomon's Temple.{Amanda}wrote about her day &{Jane}checked the newspapers.
